channel.title: CVE Feed for Dolibarr ERP & CRM -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dolibarr ERP & CRM -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1010054|2024-08-05T03:07:18.176Z -- dolibarr%20erp%20%26%20crm -- dolibarr
item.description: Dolibarr 7.0.0 is affected by: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF). The impact is: allow malitious html to change user password, disable users and disable password encryptation. The component is: Function User password change, user disable and password encryptation. The attack vector is: admin access malitious urls.

item.title: CVE-2019-1010016|2024-08-05T03:07:18.200Z -- dolibarr%20erp%20%26%20crm -- dolibarr
item.description: Dolibarr 6.0.4 is affected by: Cross Site Scripting (XSS). The impact is: Cookie stealing. The component is: htdocs/product/stats/card.php. The attack vector is: Victim must click a specially crafted link sent by the attacker.
